rows.label: qst202311_msg001
rows.name: Here we are!

rows.label: qst202311_msg002
rows.name:
Have you really removed
the four seals?

rows.label: qst202311_msg003
rows.name: Yup. Did you expect anything less?

rows.label: qst202311_msg004
rows.name:
How about you? Did you manage to
get the location of Thanatobeast
Andraz from your old teacher?

rows.label: qst202311_msg005
rows.name:
Indeed I did! You will find the fiend at
Xataris Spring in Temperantia.

rows.label: qst202311_msg006
rows.name:
Temperantia... Makes sense. If I was
a Thanatobeast, that's probably where
I'd be snoozing.

rows.label: qst202311_msg007
rows.name: Well, better get going.

rows.label: qst202311_msg008
rows.name: Please, one moment!

rows.label: qst202311_msg009
rows.name:
You won't find the Thanatobeast simply
by going to Xataris Spring.

rows.label: qst202311_msg010
rows.name:
Huh?
Is that right?

rows.label: qst202311_msg011
rows.name:
Apparently there's one more seal tying
it down to the place of its slumber.

rows.label: qst202311_msg012
rows.name:
To break it, you'll need to destroy four
more sealstones - the stones of
light, darkness, thunder and ice.

rows.label: qst202311_msg013
rows.name:
More sealing?
This really very complicated...

rows.label: qst202311_msg014
rows.name:
They must have felt like they needed to
bind it up really tightly.

rows.label: qst202311_msg015
rows.name:
I bet it was something unimaginably
terrible, huh?

rows.label: qst202311_msg016
rows.name: Yes! Really most horrible monster!

rows.label: qst202311_msg017
rows.name:
If this isn't the baddest-assed monster
to ever disgrace the world, I won't be
able to contain my disappointment.

rows.label: qst202311_msg018
rows.name: Well, we know the place now.

rows.label: qst202311_msg019
rows.name:
Let's go to Xataris Spring and break the
last seal. Then we can finally take care
of Thanatobeast Andraz!

rows.label: qst202311_msg020
rows.name: Yaegiri! Wait for Tora!
